Name: Ruya
About the game: Relax through a solipsistic tale of Ruya's spiritual path all tightly wrapped up in minimalistic puzzles. Ruya features auditory illusions crafted by our very own Enrico Ercole that are guaranteed to chill you out! HANDCRAFTED GAMEPLAY ◆ Challenge yourself with 64 handcrafted puzzles. Swipe, slide, pop, and release cute characters to progress and unfold Ruya's memories. BEAUTIFUL & HEARTFELT ◆ Decorate Ruya in flowers as you play, and shake them off at the end of each level to purify Ruya's mind. ◆ A heartwarming illustrated visual narrative that will have you smiling. SOUND ◆ Tweak binaural beats, allowing you to sink into a state of deep relaxation. ◆ The sound of rain, falling snow and whistling wind help to immerse you in 8 surrealist dreamscapes.
Meta Title: Ruya: Nov 2, 2018, Miracle Tea and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Ruya? Check out the release date (Nov 2, 2018), developer insights from Miracle Tea, and a complete game summary.
